abstract: Results of clinical trial conducted by Radius Health Inc, published in JAMA, find company's new osteoporosis drug stimulates bone growth and prevents fractures at least as well as Eli Lily's Forteo, only other such drug on market; drug from Radius, which costs less than Forteo, is expected to be approved by federal regulators

headline.print_headline: Osteoporosis, a Disease With Few Treatment Choices, May Soon Have Another
headline.main: Osteoporosis, a Disease With Few Treatment Options, May Soon Have One More

keywords.value: Journal of the American Medical Assn
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: A clinical trial found that a new drug stimulates bone growth and prevents fractures at least as well as the only other such drug on the market....
lead_paragraph: A clinical trial found that a new drug stimulates bone growth and prevents fractures at least as well as the only other such drug on the market.
